entry.title: Replying to @😶‍🌫️Queens is the king Happy Sunday! Just finished meal prepping for the next 3 days. 💃 My cookbook Hourglass Culinary Curves launches this Thursday, November 9th, featuring all my favorite delicious recipes that helped me lose weight and bui
entry.content: Replying to @😶‍🌫️Queens is the king Happy Sunday! Just finished meal prepping for the next 3 days. 💃 My cookbook Hourglass Culinary Curves launches this Thursday, November 9th, featuring all my favorite delicious recipes that helped me lose weight and build muscle. Here’s my plan for the week: For breakfast, I’ll have protein oats. Since I go to the gym at 2:30 PM, I’ll enjoy a rice cake with peanut butter and fruit (watermelon & pineapple) afterwards. Post-gym, I’ll refuel with a good protein shake. Then, at 7 PM, I’ll have 400g of grilled chicken breast from the air fryer, paired with salad—I like my protein fresh, so I season it and keep it in the fridge at the beginning of the week. I prefer a low-carb diet initially, then starting Thursday, I’ll introduce pasta, sweet potatoes, & rice. Stay tuned for dinner recipes coming soon. Have questions? Leave them in the comments! All my workouts and nutrition tips are available in my bio Don’t forget to join my private community group chat for daily support and motivation.

entry.title: #CapCut We never skip a core workout! 🔥 Remember, genetics play a role in your skin's response to weight loss. Here's my strategy: * Lose weight gradually to give your skin time to adjust—aim for 1-2 pounds a week. * Combine strength training with LISS ca
entry.content: #CapCut We never skip a core workout! 🔥 Remember, genetics play a role in your skin's response to weight loss. Here's my strategy: * Lose weight gradually to give your skin time to adjust—aim for 1-2 pounds a week. * Combine strength training with LISS cardio to build muscle and reduce the appearance of loose skin. * Stay hydrated. Water is key for skin elasticity. * Follow a balanced diet rich in protein and essential vitamins like C, D, calcium, magnesium, omega-3, and probiotics. * Care for your skin with regular exfoliation to boost blood flow and moisturizing to improve elasticity. I use bio-oil after my shower to help with stretch marks and skin elasticity. Be patient with the process. If you have questions, drop them in the comments. Ready to train with me? Check out my workout program, nutrition guide, and private community group chat in my bio. Let's get stronger together! 💪#weightloss

entry.title: From my first shaky steps to losing 128 pounds, I’ve transformed not just in body, but in spirit. When I embarked on this journey, little did I know that one day, my story would be an open book to the world. I was camera-shy and unsure, which is why early
entry.content: From my first shaky steps to losing 128 pounds, I’ve transformed not just in body, but in spirit. When I embarked on this journey, little did I know that one day, my story would be an open book to the world. I was camera-shy and unsure, which is why early pictures are rare, but my early followers on TikTok have witnessed the real, unfiltered evolution. The path wasn’t straight; I stumbled, made mistakes, and learned as I shed 117 pounds in the first 11 months, and continued to evolve over the next two years. Here's the truth: the journey is as personal as it is universal. If you're standing at the starting line, unsure and overwhelmed, remember that I was once there, too. I am the evidence that it's possible, and I'm here to share every tip and trick that made a difference in my weight loss. Let's embark on this path together because your transformation is waiting, and I'm here to help you embrace it.#weightloss #weightlosstransformation #weightlosscheck
